fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Benchmark regulation, sustainable finance, solvency II, UCITS and AIF regulations, MIFID2/MIFIR, competition policy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
legal_status: Exempt Private Company Limited by Shares
goals__remit: Scientific Beta has been created by EDHEC, a French academic institution recognized for its research in Finance, with the aim of promoting the highest level of transparency in the field of Index Management, especially in so-called “smart beta” Indices, which are an alternative to market cap Indices. The idea is to promote, under the best transparency and cost conditions, benchmarks that take appropriate account of the risks associated with equity investing. Since 2015, Scientific Beta Indices include ESG and low carbon objectives. The R&D Centre dedicated to Scientific Beta indices is based in France, inside EDHEC.
